name: Code Fusion-Realtime Collaboration
desc: It allows multiple users to write their code logic collaboratively on same IDE in Realtime.

name: Share Link-Easy File Sharing
desc: A full stack project through which user can remotely share a file of max-size 1GB just by generating a link.

name: Notes Bank
desc: A React JS project, User can write up notes in it and arrange them accordingly.Basically a clone of goole keep app.

name: Memory Matching Game
desc: Javascript based Fun game to match all the pairs of images by unflipping the cards with timer and moves tracking.

name: Auto-Quote Generator
desc: It generates a new quote in one click and it can be shared as a post on twitter through bird icon

name: University Website-Frontend
desc: A Basic Frontend design website for university and colleges.With Beautiful CSS effects and smooth scrolling.
